text:
<!everyone> hey folks! we've got some cool jobs to share today, but first i want to bump <@UUJBPA9K5>’s awesome post on content planning →
---
_*<https://superpath.co/blog/content-planning-pitch-off|Content Planning: How to Empower Your Team and Fill the Calendar with Great Ideas>*_
---
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Brightwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/233386-director-of-content-marketing-brightwheel|Director of Content Marketing> ($156k-$203k):zap:
• Crelate️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232859-senior-content-marketing-manager-crelate|Senior Content Marketing Manager> :zap:
• Protocol Labs is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231602-editorial-content-lead-protocol-labs|Editorial Content Lead> :zap:️
• O️penPhone is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222643-social-media-and-community-manager-openphone|Social Media & Community Manager> ️and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231924-head-of-content-openphone|Head of Content> :zap:
• Clinician's Brief is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216957-director-digital-content-and-audience-growth-brief-media|Director, Digital Content & Audience Growth> :tv: (:wave: <@U02NDCYLUGK>) :zap:️
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience>️ and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225913-lead-content-marketer-remote-podia|Lead Content Marketer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UJ7RT1J1X>)
• Ahrefs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225703-senior-content-marketer-martech-ahrefs|Senior Content Marketer (MarTech)> ️($40-100k)
• Orum is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/226110-content-marketing-lead-orum|Content Marketing Lead> ($80-120k) :tv: (:wave: <@U02UJE525H7>)
• Kanopi Studios is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225005-content-designer-kanopi-studios|Content Designer> 
• Appcues is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/218016-content-marketing-manager-appcues|Content Marketing Manager>
• Avive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222645-content-and-communications-marketing-manager-avive|Content & Communications Marketing Manager> ($80-120k) :tv: (:wave: <@U013BG9P1UN>)
• Mira Health is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219888-content-strategist-mira-health|Content Strategist> ️️
• Joonko Diversity is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/217267-senior-content-marketing-manager-joonko-diversity|Senior Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@UV5V2P0VB>)
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager>
• Omniscient Digital is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/213553-managing-editor-and-operations-lead-omniscient-digital|Managing Editor & Operations Lead> :tv: ️ (:wave: <@U0191E456RE> <@U01997SMK0F>)
• Very Good Marketing Agency is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216211-content-strategist-very-good-marketing-agency|Content Strategist> ️
• Pinwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/212267-content-marketing-specialist-pinwheel|Content Marketing Specialist>
• Awesome Motive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188076-wordpress-content-writer-remote-awesome-motive-inc|WordPress Content Writer (Remote)>
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• Superpath Marketplace is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232108-freelance-writer-cryptocurrency-and-blockchain-superpath|freelance crypto writer> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231842-freelance-writer-politicslobbyingadvocacy-superpath|freelance politics writer> :zap:️
• Exponent is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229409-freelance-content-writer-exponent|Freelance Content Writer> :zap:
• Stratabeat️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/226665-content-editor-stratabeat|Content Editor> ️
• WordAgents is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225011-freelance-content-writer-wordagents|Freelance Content Writer>
• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/196806-freelance-writer-remote-campfire-labs|Freelance Writer (Remote)> (:wave: <@U02C74ZGGG0>)
---
:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• Grata is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232635-content-marketing-manager-grata|Content Marketing Manager> ($90-120k) :zap:
• <http://Builder.io|Builder.io>️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232219-senior-content-strategist-builderio|Senior Content Strategist> :zap:
• Foresight Insurance️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229337-content-marketing-manager-foresight-insurance|Content Marketing Manager> :zap:
• Revmade is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/215033-managing-editor-revmade|Managing Editor> ️️
• Homerun is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/228781-content-writer-homerun|Content Writer> 
• Assembled is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/227937-content-marketing-lead-assembled|Content Marketing Lead> 
• CXL is hiring <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222945-content-lead-cxl|Content Lead> ($80-95k)
• A Network for Grateful Living is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/221652-content-strategist-a-network-for-grateful-living|Content Strategist> ️
• Mantra Health is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222955-content-marketing-manager-mantra-health|Content Marketing Manager> 
• Pitch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/210972-copywriter-pitch|Copywriter> <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/207902-freelance-writer-torii|(:wave: @Aimee Millwood)>
have a great weekend everyone!
:v: jimmy
